# GKFriendsAuthorizationStatus.notDetermined

**Case**

The player hasn’t choosen whether your game may access their friends list.

## Declaration

```swift
case notDetermined
```

## Authorization Statuses

- **GKFriendsAuthorizationStatus.authorized**: The player authorized your game to access their list of friends.
- **GKFriendsAuthorizationStatus.denied**: Access to the player’s friends’ data denied.
- **GKFriendsAuthorizationStatus.restricted**: Access to the player’s list of friends restricted.
